channel.title: CS341 on 111qqz的小窝
channel.description: Recent content in CS341 on 111qqz的小窝

item.title: The Programming Language Course
item.description: 花了三个月的时间,终于跟完了这门编程语言课. Image not found a.warning-link { color: inherit !important; font-weight: inherit !important; text-decoration: underline !important; border-bottom: none !important; } Web path: /2019/10/The-Programming-Language-Course/https://i.loli.net/2019/10/19/xDFXnKT3yWGvdQp.png Disk path: /content/post/公开课/https://i.loli.net/2019/10/19/xDFXnKT3yWGvdQp.png Using Page Bundles: true 课程内容非常赞,而且也充分发挥了coursera平台的作用. 非要说缺点的话,就是这门课时间有点短,以及peers' assignments总是找不到人... 这么课是什么 这门课并不是在讲一门特定的编程语言,而是在讲一些通用的编程语言概念. Image not found a.warning-link { color: inherit !important; font-weight: inherit !important; text-decoration: underline !important; border-bottom: none !important; } Web path: /2019/10/The-Programming-Language-Course/https://i.loli.net/2019/10/19/QUHLXbjOd7hmiMr.png Disk path: /content/post/公开课/https://i.loli.net/2019/10/19/QUHLXbjOd7hmiMr.png Using Page Bundles: true 课程本身大体上上分为三部分,分别结合sml,racket,ruby三门语言来讲. Image not found a.
